DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , Interventional , Non-Randomized , Open Label , Single Group Assignment , Single Center .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Intra-articular Ozone Injections Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: 55 79 year age Symptomatic Knee osteoarthritis VAS pain intensity least 40 mm 100 mm scale Must physically mentally willing able comply postoperative rehabilitation routinely schedule clinical radiographic visit . Any known tumor ipsilateral knee . Any known infection treat knee . Osteoarthritis operate knee Kelgren Lawrence < grade 2 . Chemotherapy treatment past 12 month . Patients sensitive ozone . Pregnant woman , breastfeed woman . Evidence significant systemic disease ( limited HIV infection , hepatitis infection HTLV infection ) , know coagulopathies , might compromise Subject 's welfare . Substance abuse alcohol abuse . Participation clinical trial parallel study .
